welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Neerpelt! Get ready to experience the charming and picturesque city known for its beautiful parks and rich culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Neerpelt has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, serving as a vital link for businesses and industries in the region.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Eindhoven Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
